Effortlessly haul a full load with the Aril Collector backpack. The ultra-solid industrial design was made specifically for Greycat's Aril armor set. It features ergonomic supports that evenly distribute the weight across the back while keeping items safe and secure, making the Aril Collector ideal for everyday wear whether salvaging a wreck, entering a mine, or simply running errands.
